values: Are You Sure You’re Called to Stay? Five Arguments from Jesus Against FearAre You Sure You’re Called to Stay? Five Arguments from Jesus Against Fear

Jesus’s words in Matthew 10:16–31 contain five powerful arguments that are able to dismantle our fears of speaking the truth of God’s word. Jesus’s words in Matthew 10:16–31 contain five powerful arguments that are able to dismantle our fears of speaking the truth of God’s word.
